resources.string:
Hey there! I hope you liked Melodrone :)

You can visit the project home at http://github.com/manero/Melodrone or you can see what I'm up to at http://ma.ne.ro.

Thanks for the support! If the app force closes, please submit the report! I'll fix it.


if you want to make a paypal donation, click here: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HTG7VD4PVVDWL
Touch the screen anywhere to start composing! You can turn the grid on and off, too!
